<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o abs.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
instr 1 ; Use two syncphasors - one is the "master", ; the other the "slave"
; master's frequency determines pitch imastercps = cpspch(p4) imaxamp = 10000
; the slave's frequency affects the timbre kslavecps line imastercps, p3, imastercps * 3
; the master "oscillator" ; the master has no sync input anosync init 0.0 am, async syncphasor imastercps, anosync
; the slave "oscillator" aout, as syncphasor kslavecps, async
adeclick linseg 0.0, 0.05, 1.0, p3 - 0.1, 1.0, 0.05, 0.0
; Output the slave's phase value which is a rising ; sawtooth wave. This produces aliasing, but hey, this ; this is just an example ;)
out aout * adeclick * imaxamp endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i1 0 1 7.00 i1 + 0.5 7.02 i1 + . 7.05 i1 + . 7.07 i1 + . 7.09 i1 + 2 7.06
e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
